body.name: CushZone Foot Rest for Under Desk at Work Adjustable Foam for Office, Work, Gaming, Computer, Gift, Home Office Accessories Back & Hip Pain Relief (Grey)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: Provides A Comfortable Sitting Position: Pain relief and support for back, hip, legs, knees & feet, the CushZone footrest will reduce pressure on your lower back and hips by cushioning the bottom of your feet to help alleviate back and sciatica pain. Our footstool will also ensure proper foot placement while sitting and correct sitting posture to help improve blood circulation in the legs and relieve pain over time.

Adjustable height of Foot Rest: The two-piece removable footrest can be used together for a total height of 6 inches or detached for individual use, and may be used to stretch your feet to any desired height. Each individual foot pillow has a non-slip ball underneath.

High Quality Foam： Our footrest foam is stiff to provide greater support. The foam does not collapse with the weight of feet yet is flexible for cushioned support. With our foot rest, your feet can be elevated to the correct position for optimal comfort.

Non-slip and Machine Washable Cover： The breathable cover allows air to circulate and won't trap heat, while the soft material is comfortable with or without shoes. The non-slip underside ensures that the under desk footrest stays in place. To clean, simply unzip cover and wash in washing machine.
Multi-Purpose The footrest is not only used to elevate your feet in the office but may also be used as an under-knee support. Great gift for anyone who works or plays while sitting at a desk OUTJOY..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Perfect Companion for Office Comfort
reviews.reviewText: As someone who spends long hours at my desk, I recently added the CushZone Foot Rest to my workspace, and it has made a significant impact on my comfort and productivity. This under-desk footrest is a versatile, adjustable, and much-needed addition to any office or home workspace.The first thing that struck me about the CushZone Foot Rest is its quality construction. The foam cushion feels durable and supportive, and the grey cover adds a touch of elegance to my workspace. The cover is also easy to clean, ensuring that it looks fresh and well-maintained at all times.The adjustability of this footrest is one of its standout features. You can easily modify the height and angle to suit your preferences and body posture. This adaptability allows me to find the perfect position to alleviate stress on my back, hips, and legs, reducing discomfort and promoting better ergonomics.Using the CushZone Foot Rest is a delight. It provides a soft, supportive surface for my feet, helping to alleviate tension and pressure from prolonged sitting. This has had a noticeable effect on my comfort and focus, especially during extended work or gaming sessions. It's also a wonderful gift for anyone who spends time at a desk, showing that you care about their well-being.The design of this footrest is both functional and unobtrusive. It fits perfectly under my desk, saving space and not interfering with my chair or workspace. Its lightweight design allows for easy portability, making it convenient to move around if needed.I can confidently say that this footrest has contributed to my overall well-being. It not only provides relief from back and hip pain but also encourages better posture and blood circulation, ultimately boosting my productivity and comfort at work. It's also a fantastic addition to my home office setup.In conclusion, the CushZone Foot Rest is a must-have office accessory for anyone who values comfort, productivity, and overall well-being. Its quality construction, adjustable design, and versatility make it a standout product for desk-bound individuals. The relief it offers from back and hip pain, coupled with its elegant and practical design, make it a valuable addition to any workspace. I highly recommend the CushZone Foot Rest to anyone looking to enhance their office experience. It's a small investment that yields substantial benefits.

reviews.reviewerName: Great chair for such a low price!
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My knees are very happy with this.
reviews.reviewText: I got a new work desk and chair and I never thought of needing a foot pillow or little chair for my feet also. I would catch myself resting my feet on the legs of the chair and it was uncomfortable and not ergo at all. A lot of the options on Amazon were either weirdly shaped or uncomfortable looking.For $16, this is exactly what I want and need. As soon as I got this home, i let the pillow fluff up on its own and it was ready to go in 30 mins or less. They're just the right height for me and my knees no longer feel sore after a full day in my chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Helps with my knee pain.
reviews.reviewText: i wanted something simple for my ankle and knee pain that i would get when sitting at my computer too long. This was the ticket. this isn't anything super fancy, but it does seem well built enough to last. i would buy another one if i ever need to down the road.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice size, just right for under desk. Soft and cozy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Came just like how it was posted on the picture and it have the comfy feeling of 5 pillows.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Material will get gross
reviews.reviewText: Yah so anyone looking for a footstool in the comfort of your own home with your shoes off then this would be it. It wish it was a bit higher but it's comfortable I guess. It comes flattened out and once out of the package it comes back to life.If your using this for your job where you would be wearing shoes, then it's going to get nasty. This material is too plushy for my taste, it dips in when you put your feet on it. I can't imagine this lasting too long after day in and day out of putting the bottom of your shoes on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for office jobs/desk jobs
reviews.reviewText: I have had this product for a few weeks now and love it. I work at a desk in IT. The way I lean back in my chair, the chair always cuts into my legs and causes them to either go numb or just hurt by the end of the day.After having this my legs don't hurt anymore as it keeps my legs elevated over the edge of the chair and with the cloud feeling, it keeps my feet from hurting from being on the hard floor. Also haves my shoes from the rubbing on the ground.I was sceptical when it arrived as it was flat as a pancake but when I unwrapped it, it blew up and looked like the picture in Amazon. It has a zipper and Velcro to keep it stable but my Velcro does not seam even so it looks like it uneven but the zipper evened it out. The zipper is also hard to work with (for me) but I just keep it zipped up.I love the fact you can wash the fabric part of it. All in all this is a great product for your self or even for a gift. Keep up the great work with this guys.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does as it says it does.
reviews.reviewText: this product has been life changing for me while sitting at my desk. great pain relief from my hips and back, would definitely recommend. great price.
